thread.title_full: Birthday upgrade - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin S
title: Birthday upgrade
text: The lovely receptionist found out while my daughter and I were checking in that the trip to Paris was to celebrate my birthday, and upgraded our room to a 'privilege' room with two double beds in separate rooms rather than the twin we had booked. It had a wonderful view of the Eifel Tower. And she sent us a glass of champagne each. This was delightful and really set the tone for the break in a wonderful way. I've used Mercure hotels for business and always found them reasonable: clean, tidy, and professional. This was a gesture that set them apart.
